fullText:
Stinging Swarm

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Druid, Primal Swarm class feature, wild shape power
Benefit: Once per round when an enemy damages you with a melee attack while you are in beast form, that enemy grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.

Published in Primal Power, page(s) 142.
name: Stinging Swarm
prerequisite: Druid, Primal Swarm class feature, wild shape power
benefit: Once per round when an enemy damages you with a melee attack while you are in beast form, that enemy grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.
